english.segment1: You would think that I could find a. simple song, a photograph of mine. To show this public eye, what I have to offer. I may not have a PHD, or speak in eloquent philosophy!. I'm nothing more than simply me you see!
english.segment2: CHORUS(*1): What I am trying to say. I'm just a babe in so many ways!
english.segment3: I'm still growing, still stretchin. Still breaking in these new shoes. Looking for a way to make a mark of my own. I'm just a spring chick, wet behind the ears. It's a part of life so there's no need to fear. These growing pains that I'm going through
english.segment4: I don't regret, I'm not ashamed that I. haven't yet begun to speaketh ways.. (As the wisest of men), oh perhaps some day. But for now I'm grateful to be a part of. the family tree, while The Man upstairs does His work on me. It's a job that may take eternity to complete
english.segment5: CHORUS(*2): Just when I've learned all I can, those growing. Pains up and kick on in again!
english.segment7: BRIDGE: Time after time, one more time and again, will it ever end?. It's the lessons in our lives that make us wise. But young or old I am told its the same. Oh, these growing pains never go away, so I'll just keep on trying
english.segment11: Oh, baby dont worry about a thang!
